testcase.name: User can create a booking

charset=utf-8 Content-Length: 197 Etag: W/"c5-gJnrfuqEtVDstxyKFdIIo1yr13c" Date: Fri, 20 Aug 2021 14:55:56 GMT Via: 1.1 vegur
